sourcesContent:
import "./sm.css" export default function Sm1() { return (

The treasure house within you

  • “I might fail, I might lose money, people will laugh at me” - this type of man will not get very far in life because if he is afraid to go forward he will simply stay where he is“I might fail, I might lose money, people will laugh at me” - this type of man will not get very far in life because if he is afraid to go forward he will simply stay where he is
  • You can bring into life more power, more wealth, more health and more happiness and more joy by learning to contact and release the hidden power of your subconscious mind
  • You need not acquire this power because you already possess it, you must learn how to use it
  • Within your subconscious depths lie infinite wisdom, infinite power and infinite supply of all that is necessary which is waiting for development and expression
  • When the thoughts deposited in your subconscious mind are constructive, harmonious and peaceful they will come about in the outer world as well
  • Every thought is a cause and every condition is an effect
  • It is essential you take charge of your thought to bring about only desirable condition
  • Knowledge of the interaction of your conscious and subconscious mind will enable you to transform your whole life
  • In order to change external conditions you must change the cause
  • You need to remove the cause, which is the way you are using your conscious mind
  • In other words the way you are thinking and picturing in your mind
  • Your subconscious mind is reactive and responds to the nature of your thoughts
  • The subconscious mind is a subject to the conscious mind that is why it is called subconscious or subjective
  • The conscious mind is like the captain of the ship
  • Ship is your body, environment and all your affairs
  • Subconscious mind is all the workers in the boiler room, pumping coal and running the engine
  • Your subconscious mind takes the orders you believe based on what your conscious mind believes and accepts as true
  • When you repeatedly say people “I can’t afford it” your subconscious mind takes over and sees to it that you will not be in a position to purchase what you want
  • Your subconscious mind will follow orders and you will go through life experiencing the lack of these things
  • When your conscious mind (little me) is full of FEAR, ANXIETY AND WORRY.
  • Your negative emotions engendered in your subconscious mind (big me) is released and flood your conscious mind with a sense of PANIC, FOREBODING AND DESPAIR.
  • If you say you do not like mushrooms, the subconscious mind says to your conscious mind that you do not like mushrooms and you will get indigestion
  • If you tell your subconscious mind coffee will keep you awake at night it will happen
  • If you tell your subconscious mind I cannot solve leetcode hard problems you will not
  • Ideas can be conveyed to the subconscious mind by repetition, hope and expectancy
) }
